video_prompt: Futuristic Chinese city at dawn. Glowing great wall pulsates with energy. Celestial ring emits light, orbited by sleek vehicles. Tiny figures bustle through luminous streets. Clouds drift, bathed in sunrise and neon glow. Dynamic interplay of light, movement, and human activity across a fantastical landscape.
image_prompt: Futuristic Chinese landscape: A Great Wall reimagined with glowing neon circuits, a bustling ancient city below a colossal, glowing celestial ring-station in a star-filled sky, with futuristic vehicles and traditional pagodas blending past and future.
refined_video_prompt: Dawn ascends over a futuristic Chinese metropolis. The Great Wall pulses with an evolving, energetic glow. A celestial ring emits dynamically shifting light, continuously orbited by sleek vehicles. Tiny figures ceaselessly bustle through the streets, which subtly shift in luminescence. Clouds drift languidly, their forms changing within the transitioning hues of sunrise and neon. Light, motion, and human activity constantly evolve across this fantastical panorama.
